skill.name: web-artifacts-builder
skill.description: Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern frontend web technologies (React, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui). Use for complex artifacts requiring state management, routing, or shadcn/ui components - not for simple single-file HTML/JSX artifacts.
skill.summary: Build complex React web artifacts with shadcn/ui components and bundle into single HTML files
skill.author: anthropics

security_audit.summary: Official Anthropic skill for building React web artifacts. Shell scripts use standard npm and build tooling for project initialization and bundling. All risk factors are appropriate for legitimate frontend development workflows.

content.user_title: Build Complex React Artifacts with Modern UI Components
content.value_statement: Creating multi-component web applications as single HTML artifacts is challenging without proper tooling. This skill automates React project setup with shadcn/ui components and bundles everything into shareable HTML files.
actual_capabilities: Initialize React TypeScript projects with Vite and Tailwind CSS pre-configured
Bundle multi-component React applications into single HTML files
Include 40+ pre-installed shadcn/ui components with Radix UI dependencies
Configure path aliases and theming system automatically
Support state management and routing in complex artifacts
Generate self-contained HTML files with inlined JavaScript and CSS
limitations: Not suitable for simple single-file HTML or JSX artifacts
Requires Node.js 18 or higher for project execution
Bundle size may be large for artifacts with many components
Limited to frontend-only applications without backend integration

use_cases.title: Interactive Dashboard Creation
use_cases.description: Build data visualization dashboards with charts, tables, and interactive controls using shadcn/ui components and share as single HTML artifacts.
use_cases.target_user: Data analysts and business intelligence developers

use_cases.title: Prototype Web Applications
use_cases.description: Rapidly prototype multi-page web applications with routing and state management for client presentations or user testing.

use_cases.title: Educational Web Demos
use_cases.description: Create interactive learning materials with complex UI components that can be easily distributed as standalone HTML files.

prompt_templates.title: Create a Simple Dashboard
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a dashboard artifact with a header, sidebar navigation, and a main content area showing placeholder cards
prompt_templates.scenario: Quick start for users new to the skill

prompt_templates.title: Build Interactive Form
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a multi-step form artifact using shadcn/ui form components with validation and progress indicator

prompt_templates.title: Design Data Table with Filtering
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an artifact with a data table that supports sorting, filtering, and pagination using shadcn/ui table components

prompt_templates.title: Develop Complex SPA
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a single-page application artifact with multiple routes, a navigation menu, authentication UI, and state management for user preferences

output_examples.input: Create a task management dashboard with a list of tasks and an add task button
output_examples.output: A React artifact initialized with task list component, add task dialog using shadcn/ui components, and state management. Bundled into bundle.html ready for sharing.

output_examples.input: Build a pricing comparison page with three pricing tiers and feature lists
output_examples.output: A responsive pricing page artifact with shadcn/ui card components, feature tables, and call-to-action buttons. All styles and scripts inlined in single HTML file.

best_practices: Use this skill for complex artifacts that need multiple components or advanced UI features
Test the bundled HTML artifact before sharing to ensure all assets are properly inlined
Follow the design guidelines to avoid generic AI styling patterns like excessive centered layouts and purple gradients
anti_patterns: Using this skill for simple single-component artifacts that could be created with basic HTML
Skipping the bundle step and trying to share the unbundled React project
Adding backend server code or API endpoints to the artifact

faq.question: When should I use this skill instead of creating a simple HTML artifact?
faq.answer: Use this skill when you need multiple components, state management, routing, or shadcn/ui components. For simple single-file HTML or JSX, use standard artifact creation.

faq.question: What components are included in the shadcn/ui library?
faq.answer: The skill pre-installs 40+ components including buttons, forms, dialogs, tables, navigation, cards, and more. See the shadcn/ui documentation for the complete list.

faq.question: Can I add custom dependencies to my artifact?
faq.answer: Yes, you can install additional npm packages during development. They will be bundled into the final HTML file when you run the bundle script.

faq.question: How large will my bundled HTML file be?
faq.answer: File size depends on components used. Simple artifacts are typically 200-500 KB. Complex apps with many components may be 1-2 MB or larger.

faq.question: Can I use this skill for production applications?
faq.answer: This skill is designed for creating shareable artifacts and prototypes. For production applications, use standard React deployment workflows.

faq.question: What Node.js version do I need?
faq.answer: Node.js 18 or higher is required. The initialization script automatically detects your version and configures the project accordingly.
